Translations.Text: Apanara kache ibarahimera sam'manita mehamanadera brttanta eseche ki
yakhana tara tara kache upasthita haye balala, ‘salama’. Uttare tini balalena, ‘salama’. Era to aparicita loka
Atahpara ibarahima tara strira kache druta cupisare gelena [1] ebam ekati mota-taja go-bachura (bhaja) niye asalena
atahpara tini ta tadera samane rekhe balalena, ‘tomara ki khabe na?’
Ete tadera samparke tara mane bhitira sancara hala [1]. Tara balala, ‘bhita habena na.’ Ara tara take eka jnani putra santanera susambada dila
Takhana tara stri citkara karate karate sam'mukhe asala ebam tara gala capariye balala, ‘brd'dha-bandhya’
tara balala, ‘apanara raba erupa'i balechena; niscaya tini prajnamaya, sarbajna
Ibarahima balalena, ‘he prerita pheresatagana! Tomadera bisesa kaja [1] ki?’
Tara balala, ‘niscaya amara eka aparadhi sampradayera prati prerita hayechi
Yate tadera upara niksepa kari matira sakta dhela
ya simalanghanakaridera jan'ya cihnita apanara rabera kacha theke [1].’
Atahpara sekhane yesaba mumina chila amara taderake bera kare niye asalama
Tabe amara sekhane ekati paribara chara ara kono musalima pa'ini
Ara yara marmambhada sastike bhaya kare amara tadera jan'ya okhane ekati nidarsana rekhechi
Ara nidarsana rekhechi musara brttante'o, yakhana amara take spasta pramanasaha phira’a'unera kache pathalama
takhana se ksamatara ahankare mukha phiriye nila [1] ebam balala, ‘e byakti haya eka jadukara, na haya eka unmada.’
Kaje'i amara take o tara dalabalake sasti dilama ebam tadera sagare niksepa karalama, ara se chila tiraskrta
Ara nidarsana rayeche ‘adera ghatanate'o, yakhana amara tadera birud'dhe prerana karechilama akalyanakara bayu
eta ya kichura upara diye baye giyechila take'i yena parinata karala curna-bicurna dhbansastupe
Ara'o nidarsana rayeche samudera brttante'o, yakhana taderake bala hayechila, ‘bhoga kare na'o ekati nidrsta kala.’
Atahpara tara tadera rabera adesa manate ahankara karala; phale taderake pakara'o karala bajra [1] ebam tara ta dekhachila
Atahpara tara uthe damrate parala na ebam pratirodha karate'o parala na
Ara (dhbansa karechilama) edera age nuhera sampradayake, niscaya tara chila phaseka sampradaya
